titles: A poem humbly dedicated to the great patern [sic] of piety and virtue Catherine, Queen Dowager on the death of her dear lord and husband, King Charles II / by Mrs. Behn.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
publisher: Printed by J. Playford for Henry Playford ...
notes: Caption title: A poem on Her Sacred Majesty, Catherine, Queen Dowager.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
